Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Damen
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Western, Roscoe, Damen, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Western, Roscoe, Damen, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Cottage Grove, 75th, Stony Island and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Cottage Grove, 75th, Stony Island and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Addison and Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Addison and Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Addison and Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton.

As a result, Red Line trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Addison, and,
  • between Roosevelt and 95th only.

Red Line shuttle buses are available between Addison and Roosevelt to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Southport and the Loop
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Southport and Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Fullerton.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Southport at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Southport and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
